flawed_nl_solution:
Lake Crystal has twenty percent fewer frogs than Lassie Lake, a total of 1/5*45=<<1/5*45=225>>225 frogs
The total number of frogs in Lake Crystal is 45-225=<<45-225=-180>>-180
Together, the two lakes have -180+45=<<-180+45=-135>>-135 frogs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 225. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
